original_title: 少女☆歌劇 レヴュースタァライト ―The LIVE 青嵐― BLUE GLITTER
overview: Revue Starlight ―The LIVE Seiran― BLUE GLITTER is a spin-off of Revue Starlight ―The LIVE― #2 Transition and features the students and staff of Seiran General Art Institute, which aims to win the national high school drama championship overall.  Koharu Yanagi, head of the drama major in the stage department, is impatient because the performance has not been decided.  The impatience spreads to deputy chiefs Ryo Minamifu and Hyonami Honami, and the gears of the three people slowly start to go haywire.
title: Revue Starlight ―The LIVE Seiran― BLUE GLITTER
